en.debug: Print debug information on the serial port? [Default: no]
en.messagingInterface: Which interface shall be used to send messages, Serial or Serial1? [Default: Serial1]
en.typeArduino: Is the board an Arduino Micro/Arduino Leonardo? [Default: yes]
en.shiftPin: Which pin is the Shift key connected to? [Default: 4]
en.ctrlPin: Which pin is the Ctrl key connected to? [Default: 3]
en.lcdCols: How many columns (characters) does the LCD display have? [Default: 16]
en.lcdRows: How many rows does the LCD display have? [Default: 2]
en.keypadRow1: Which pin is the first row of the keypad (keys 1, 2, 3, +) connected to? [Default: 12]
en.keypadRow2: Which pin is the second row of the keypad (keys 4, 5, 6, -) connected to? [Default: 11]
en.keypadRow3: Which pin is the third row of the keypad (keys 7, 8, 9, *) connected to? [Default: 10]
en.keypadRow4: Which pin is the fourth row of the keypad (keys S, 0, D, /) connected to? [Default: 9]
en.keypadCol1: Which pin is the first column of the keypad (keys 1, 4, 7, S) connected to? [Default: 8]
en.keypadCol2: Which pin is the second column of the keypad (keys 2, 5, 8, 0) connected to? [Default: 7]
en.keypadCol3: Which pin is the third column of the keypad (keys 3, 6, 9, D) connected to? [Default: 6]
en.keypadCol4: Which pin is the fourth column of the keypad (keys +, -, *, /) connected to? [Default: 5]

it.debug: Stampare informazioni di debug sulla porta seriale? [Default: no]
it.messagingInterface: Quale interfaccia usare per i messaggi, Serial o Serial1? [Default: Serial1]
it.typeArduino: La scheda e' un Arduino Micro/Arduino Leonardo? [Default: si]
it.shiftPin: A quale pin e' collegato il tasto Shift? [Default: 4]
it.ctrlPin: A quale pin e' collegato il tasto Ctrl? [Default: 3]
it.lcdCols: Quante colonne (caratteri) ha il display LCD? [Default: 16]
it.lcdRows: Quante righe ha il display LCD? [Default: 2]
it.keypadRow1: A quale pin e' collegata la prima riga del tastierino (tasti 1, 2, 3, +)? [Default: 12]
it.keypadRow2: A quale pin e' collegata la seconda riga del tastierino (tasti 4, 5, 6, -)? [Default: 11]
it.keypadRow3: A quale pin e' collegata la terza riga del tastierino (tasti 7, 8, 9, *)? [Default: 10]
it.keypadRow4: A quale pin e' collegata la quarta riga del tastierino (tasti S, 0, D, /)? [Default: 9]
it.keypadCol1: A quale pin e' collegata la prima colonna del tastierino (tasti 1, 4, 7, S)? [Default: 8]
it.keypadCol2: A quale pin e' collegata la seconda colonna del tastierino (tasti 2, 5, 8, 0)? [Default: 7]
it.keypadCol3: A quale pin e' collegata la terza colonna del tastierino (tasti 3, 6, 9, D)? [Default: 6]
it.keypadCol4: A quale pin e' collegata la quarta colonna del tastierino (tasti +, -, *, /)? [Default: 5]
